titleStmt.title: An exact collection of many wonderful prophecies relating to the government of England &c. since the first year of the reign of King James I to this present time all which have been truly fulfilled and accomplished : also ... foretelling what government is to succeed to make this kingdom happy : with the certain time of the downfal of Antichrist throughout the world / written and published ... by P.C.
titleStmt.author: P. C.
Wither, George, 1588-1667.

notesStmt.note: "Withers's prophecie of the downfall of Antichrist": p. 17-22.
"George Withers his prophecie of the downfal of Antichrist": p. 23-31.
